description: This dataset contains county-level data for AQI for the years 2018-2022

variables.name: rate_notgood_aqi
variables.description: The proportion of days that are classified as Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups, Unhealthy, Very Unhealthy, or Hazardous
variables.units: Number of days out of the total AQI days
variables.source_notes: See https://www.airnow.gov/aqi/aqi-basics/, for information about AQI levels
